messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2060
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/22/02 12:28:20 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/22/02 12:28:20 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< He also said, "Mom, you know the thing public school doesn't teach is how
to LIVE! They just teach you all this stuff that you never use again but
nothing about the things you will need." >>


Oh what a very wise son you have Betty.
Your post was so wonderful....it's exciting to read of people's shifts in
thinking and the joy it can bring.
I don't have a child that watches less tv once I let go of any
control.....sometimes I wish!!! But it is amazing the things that can happen
when you give them the freedom they so richly deserve.
Ren
